mandateStepperForm.step1.card.heading: Mandate Title
mandateStepperForm.step1.card.inputTextF: Title must be between 2 and 80 characters long and should not start or end with a space
mandateStepperForm.step2.card.heading: Tell us something about this mandate.
mandateStepperForm.step2.card.inputTextF: Description must be between 4 and 300 characters long
mandateStepperForm.step3.card.heading: Upload or pick a thumbnail for your mandate.
mandateStepperForm.step4.card.heading: Set the timeline for your mandate
mandateStepperForm.card.EndDate.label: End date
mandateStepperForm.card.startDate.label: Start date
mandateStepperForm.final.tagLine: Ensure your mandate details are perfect by previewing them before submitting.
